CmdLine: apk --no-cache upgrade  && apk add --no-cache postgresql-contrib postgresql bash tini  && apk add --no-cache -X http://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine/edge/testing postgis  && mkdir -p /run/postgresql  && chown -R postgres:postgres /run/postgresql
Commands.Name: run
